itunes:title: Painting Rainbows (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Thomas Jones. Claudia possesses a special gift for painting, but she keeps it close to her chest. If she can find the courage, she may just realize a life of great prosperity.
